Lyric:
[00:09.19]I know you love her, love her
[00:11.10]But deep down under the covers, covers
[00:13.50]Does she know that I’m the other, other, does she?
[00:19.04]Well it’s not like I planned this, planned this
[00:21.05]But you were so fucking romantic, romantic
[00:23.82]Why you always like it so frantic, frantic
[00:26.85]This ain’t me
[00:28.49]
[00:29.80]Just love me, love me, love me, love me when the lights go down
[00:34.95]And hold me, hold me, hold me till it’s dawn
[00:39.94]And maybe you can make me forgive myself
[00:45.00]And leave me, leave me, leave me when it’s done
[00:48.43]
[00:50.02]‘Cause you’ve been nothing but trouble
[00:53.89]I know what you’re up to
[00:57.67]Try to get into my head
[01:00.13]‘Cause you’ve been nothing but trouble
[01:04.07]I know what you’re up to
[01:07.42]Play it over and over again
[01:10.21]
[01:29.67]No I won’t blow your cover, cover
[01:31.84]I know it's not your fault that you love her, love her
[01:34.19]And I’m betting that you will discover
[01:36.62]I’m not someone you can try to keep
[01:39.89]Well it's not like I planned this, planned this
[01:41.90]But you were so fucking romantic, romantic
[01:44.48]Why you always like it so frantic, frantic
[01:47.80]This ain’t me
[01:49.21]
[01:50.57]Just love me, love me, love me, love me when the lights go down
[01:55.77]And hold me, hold me, hold me till it’s dawn
[02:00.73]And maybe you can make me forgive myself
[02:05.98]And leave me, leave me, leave me when it’s done
[02:09.27]
[02:10.92]‘Cause you’ve been nothing but trouble
[02:14.79]I know what you’re up to
[02:18.44]Try to get into my head
[02:20.90]‘Cause you’ve been nothing but trouble
[02:24.82]I know what you’re up to
[02:28.32]Play it over and over again
